affiliations.role: Executive Vice President of Cloud and Enterprise Group

summary: Satya Nadella is an American business executive, currently serving as the chairman and CEO of Microsoft. He became CEO in 2014 and chairman in 2021, having previously been the executive vice president of Microsoft's cloud and enterprise group.

affiliations.role: Co-founder and former head of applied AI

summary: Mustafa Suleyman is a British AI entrepreneur, CEO of Microsoft AI, co-founder of DeepMind, and co-founder of Inflection AI.

Samuel Harris Altman is an American entrepreneur and investor, CEO of OpenAI since 2019, and chairman of Oklo Inc. and Helion Energy. He was president of Y Combinator from 2014 to 2019 and co-founded Loopt. His net worth was estimated at $1.1 billion in January 2025.

Alain Berset is a Swiss politician who served on the Swiss Federal Council from 2012 to 2023, leading the Federal Department of Home Affairs and serving as President of the Swiss Confederation in 2018 and 2023. He was a member of the Council of States from 2003 to 2011 and became Secretary General of the Council of Europe in 2024.

affiliations.role: Chief Technology Officer and EVP of AI

summary: Sal Khan, founder and CEO of Khan Academy, discusses his journey from tutoring his cousin to creating a global educational platform. He emphasizes the importance of using technology, including AI, to enhance learning and provide personalized education. Khan Academy, a nonprofit, aims to offer free, world-class education to anyone, anywhere. Sal Khan's book, 'Brave New Words,' explores how AI can revolutionize education. The conversation also highlights the role of influential figures in shaping one's career and the potential of AI to empower learners.
